title: (x) "Mère & monde" website font - Optima {Jan E}
content:
Hi all,

Take a look at this company’s name:

[http://mereetmonde.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215013601/http:/mereetmonde.com/ "http://mereetmonde.com/")

Obviously the big M is most likely custom made but what about the other letters.

Thanks

 [‹ heavy condensed face, very square, rounded corners](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215013601/http:/typophile.com/node/39031 "Go to previous forum topic") [slave trade poster fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215013601/http:/typophile.com/node/39027 "Go to next forum topic")
author: slave1

comments.content:
Close enough for me, thanks a lot Jan
